global.no_progress: Do not show progress bar in CLI.
global.custom_presets:
Specify a json file containing custom compression presets.
See compression.json for format.
Note that if present, 'custom_preset.json' from config directory would be auto loaded.

output.author: Set author of created sticker pack.
output.title: Set name of created sticker pack.

comp.no_compress: Do not compress files. Useful for only downloading stickers.
comp.steps:
Set number of divisions between min and max settings.
Steps higher = Slower but yields file more closer to the specified file size limit.
comp.processes:
Set number of processes. Default to half of logical processors in system.
Processes higher = Compress faster but consume more resources.
comp.fps: FPS Higher = Smoother but larger size.
comp.fps_power: Between -1 and positive infinity. Power lower = More importance of the parameter, try harder to keep higher and not sacrifice.
comp.res: Resolution higher = Clearer but larger size.
comp.res_power:
Between -1 and positive infinity.
Power lower = More importance of the parameter,
try harder to keep higher and not sacrifice.
comp.quality: Quality higher = Clearer but larger size.
comp.quality_power: Between -1 and positive infinity. Power lower = More importance of the parameter, try harder to keep higher and not sacrifice.
comp.color:
Reduce size by limiting number of colors.
Makes image 'blocky'. >256 will disable this.
Applies to png and apng only.
Color higher = More colors but larger size.
comp.color_min: Set minimum number of colors (For converting to apng and apng only).
comp.color_max: Set maximum number of colors (For converting to apng and apng only).
comp.color_power: Between -1 and positive infinity. Power lower = More importance of the parameter, try harder to keep higher and not sacrifice.
comp.duration:
Change playback speed if outside of duration limit.
Duration set in miliseconds.
0 will disable limit.
comp.duration_min: Set minimum output duration in miliseconds.
comp.duration_max: Set maximum output duration in miliseconds.
comp.padding_percent: Set percentage of space used as padding.
comp.bg_color:
Set custom background color in rrggbbaa format.
Example: 00ff0000 for green with alpha 0.
If this is not set, background color would be auto set to black if image is bright, or white if image is dark.
Note: The color should not be visible if output format supports transparency.
comp.size: Set maximum file size in bytes for video and image.
comp.vid_size_max: Set maximum file size limit for animated stickers.
comp.img_size_max: Set maximum file size limit for static stickers.
comp.format: Set file format for video and image.
comp.vid_format: Set file format if input is animated.
comp.img_format: Set file format if input is static.
comp.fake_vid:
Convert (faking) image to video.
Useful if:
(1) Size limit for video is larger than image;
(2) Mix image and video into same pack.
comp.scale_filter:
Set scale filter. Default as bicubic. Valid options are:
- nearest = Use nearest neighbour (Suitable for pixel art)
- box = Similar to nearest, but better downscaling
- bilinear = Linear interpolation
- hamming = Similar to bilinear, but better downscaling
- bicubic = Cubic spline interpolation
- lanczos = A high-quality downsampling filter
comp.quantize_method:
Set method for quantizing image. Default as imagequant. Valid options are:
- imagequant = Best quality but slow
- fastoctree = Fast but image looks chunky
- none = No image quantizing, large image size as result
comp.cache_dir:
Set custom cache directory.
Useful for debugging, or speed up conversion if cache_dir is on RAM disk.
comp.chromium_path:
Set Chromium(-based)/Chrome browser path.
Required for converting from SVG files.
Leave blank to auto detect
comp.default_emoji: Set the default emoji for uploading Signal and Telegram sticker packs.

cred.signal_uuid: Set Signal uuid. Required for uploading Signal stickers.
cred.signal_password: Set Signal password. Required for uploading Signal stickers.
cred.telegram_token: Set Telegram token. Required for uploading and downloading Telegram stickers.
cred.telegram_userid: Set Telegram user_id (From real account, not bot account). Required for uploading Telegram stickers.
cred.kakao_auth_token: Set Kakao auth_token. Required for downloading animated stickers from https://e.kakao.com/t/xxxxx
cred.kakao_get_auth: Generate Kakao auth_token by simulating login. Kakao username, password, country code and phone number are also required.
cred.kakao_get_auth_desktop: Get Kakao auth_token from Kakao Desktop application.
cred.kakao_bin_path:
Set Kakao Desktop application path for launching and getting auth_token.
Useful for portable installation.
cred.kakao_username:
Set Kakao username, which is email or phone number used for signing up Kakao account
Example: +447700900142
Required for generating Kakao auth_token.
cred.kakao_password:
Set Kakao password (Password of Kakao account).
Required for generating Kakao auth_token.
cred.kakao_country_code:
Set Kakao country code of phone.
Example: 82 (For korea), 44 (For UK), 1 (For USA).
Required for generating Kakao auth_token.
cred.kakao_phone_number:
Set Kakao phone number (Phone number associated with your Kakao account)
Do NOT enter country code
Example: 7700900142
Used for send / receive verification code via SMS.
Required for generating Kakao auth_token.
cred.line_get_auth: Get Line cookies from browser, which is required to create custom message stickers.
cred.line_cookies: Set Line cookies, which is required to create custom message stickers.
cred.viber_auth:
Set Viber authentication data.
Required for uploading Viber stickers.
cred.viber_bin_path:
Specify location of Viber Desktop application.
Useful for portable installation.
cred.discord_token: Set Discord token. Required for downloading Discord stickers and emojis.
